players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "'I believe we need to be vigilant and keep a close eye on each other tonight. With one of us being a mafioso, it's crucial that we work together during the day and use our votes wisely.'..."
Diana: "'I agree with Charlie's sentiment. Let's all be cautious and communicate openly during the day to help us make informed decisions.'"

Diana: "'I think we should consider the possibility that Alice's death was an accident rather than a deliberate act. We can't jump to conclusions based on one incident alone. Let's focus on gathering more information during the night and use our votes wisely.'"
You: "I think Diana is trying to deflect attention from the real killer. Why suggest Alice's death was an accident when we know it was a mafia kill?"

Charlie: "'I believe we should stick to our initial plan of working together and communicating openly. It's important that we don't let suspicion cloud our judgement and make hasty decisions. Let's focus on gathering more information during the night and use our votes w..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
